title: A1418 2012 820-3302-A chimes continuously with blanc white screen with no image
message: Sometimes it chimes once and it stays in white screen with no image and some times it chimes continuously. I have tried another cpu and another bios but still no change. Any ideas?

title: A1418 2012 820-3302-A chimes continuously with blanc white screen with no image
message:
Do few PRAM resets first.
Reseat DDR modules.
Try one known good module at a time; every DDR slot.
Disconnect power button and CMOS coin cell.
Check if something change; should start automatically.

title: A1418 2012 820-3302-A chimes continuously with blanc white screen with no image
A1418 2012 820-3302-A chimes continuously with blanc white screen with no image
message: Try new BIOS, with clean ME region.

title: A1418 2012 820-3302-A chimes continuously with blanc white screen with no image
message: did it, still the same, any other ideas?
